Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to penalties for failure to comply with maintenance and reporting of vacant and abandoned properties, and reporting and release of information
Summary: Relates to penalties for failure to comply with maintenance and reporting of vacant and abandoned properties, and reporting and release of information; provides for the sharing of information between municipalities; provides for enforcement for failure to report on abandoned and vacant properties.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to penalties for failure to comply with maintenance and reporting of vacant and abandoned properties, and reporting and release of information
